mapper.select: select p.profile_idx, p.name, p.img_name, p.regdate, p.user_id, p.birth, p.gender, u.subs, u.subs_date, u.subs_update, p.like_thema as like_themaAsString from profiles p left join users u on p.user_id = u.user_id where p.profile_idx = #{profile_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into profiles(name, img_name, regdate, user_id, like_thema, birth, gender) values(#{name}, #{img_name}, NOW(), #{user_id}, #{like_themaAsString}, #{birth}, #{gender})
